Decatur.Decatur Memorial Hospital: Decatur Memorial Hospital is a large, regional nonprofit, private hospital in Decatur, Illinois that was opened on 1 January 1916. As of 2011, Fitch Ratings had stated that DMH's "weak profitability is a loss of market share in cardiac volume when its main competitor decided to employ the largest cardiology group in town". As of 2013, its revenue was $272 million.
